Text: Is this a mutha fucking Trojan blaster ?
It's real. As the info says, it is NOT the Hollywood blockbuster "Battleship" movie (of which there are screeners floating around), but an Asylum "mockbuster" movie called "American Battleship".
Apparently this movie also has other names in other countries. The IMDB link says "American Warship", but the movie is clearly titled "American Battleship" in the opening credits. (shrug).
Not the same scifi movie. Different but valid movie.
